Tonga: Captain James Cook first visited Tonga and referred to it as the "Friendly Islands".
Sweden: The Royal Swedish Opera is founded.
Russia: Pugachev's Rebellion: The army of the Cossack Yemelyan Pugachev attacked and occupied Samara.
A confederated sejm was forced to ratify the first partition of Poland.
Poland: Creation of Commission of National Education
India: Narayanrao Peshwa is murdered by his uncle Raghunathrao's wife in front of Raghunathrao.
Warren Hastings appointed as first Governor-General of India
Colombia: Foundation of San Jose de Cúcuta by Juana Rangel de Cuellar
